actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the commemoration of the efforts of Goodloe Byron to protect the Appalachian Trail.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to encourage the Appalachian Trail Conference, in cooperation with the State of Maryland, to design and erect at a location along the Maryland segment of the Appalachian Trail an appropriate marker in commemoration of the contributions of Goodloe Byron toward the protection of the Trail.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the commemoration of the efforts of Goodloe Byron to protect the Appalachian Trail.
